title:xBeAsTx's Wishlist
description:Wishlist rolls from xBeAsTx#7023 for those items that don't currently exist in the main wishlist rolls yet (usually due to them being new releases) or for when those wishlists don't align with my preferences although rare.
// https://raw.githubusercontent.com/BasicNullification/d2wishlist/main/Wishlist.txt
// https://48klocs.github.io/wish-list-magic-wand/fingerwave.html
// https://data.destinysets.com/

// Nameless Midnight
//notes:xBeAsTx#7023 (PvE): This isn't the best weapon in the game, but then again, it's a scout rifle so that's its largest hinderance. However, I remember this being my trust go-to weapon in year 1 and the nostalgia factor hits hard for me, so I feel the need to have one in my inventory once again - explosive rounds are pretty much a must for me to bring back the original feel here as well - just doesn't feel the same without them.|tags:pve
